title: Gingerbread houses
ingredients: ['For the Gingerbread', '115g butter', '125g caster sugar', '225g honey', '2 eggs', '500g plain flour or as needed', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon ground cloves', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', 'To Decorate', '1 egg white', '300g icing sugar', 'sweets of various shapes and colours']
